body_html:
Ok, sure, here it is: https://gist.github.com/zmjjmz/9b013c6524839512b85dfc08a56f28c2

It's possible that something about how I defined serving_input_fn is incorrect (it works for normal estimators), but I also couldn't find any documentation on how to properly / differently define it for an Estimator that came from tf.keras.estimator.model_to_estimator.
body_text:
Ok, sure, here it is: https://gist.github.com/zmjjmz/9b013c6524839512b85dfc08a56f28c2
It's possible that something about how I defined serving_input_fn is incorrect (it works for normal estimators), but I also couldn't find any documentation on how to properly / differently define it for an Estimator that came from tf.keras.estimator.model_to_estimator.
body:
Ok, sure, here it is: https://gist.github.com/zmjjmz/9b013c6524839512b85dfc08a56f28c2

It's possible that something about how I defined `serving_input_fn` is incorrect (it works for normal estimators), but I also couldn't find any documentation on how to properly / differently define it for an Estimator that came from `tf.keras.estimator.model_to_estimator`.
